brainly_data.question: What is the purpose of using literary analysis on a poem
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: What is the purpose of using literary analysis on a poem
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: A literary analysis essay takes a position on some aspect of a book, story, or poem and seeks to convince the reader of its validity. Your job is to explain and interpret, not simply retell.
